      • resetStatics

        public static boolean resetStatics
        An indicator of initialization of static fields. This enables us to control when static fields are initialized, while "static block" will be always initialized or executed. The latter could cause unexpected exceptions when multiple runs (with different configuration files) are conducted sequentially, because some static settings will not be override in such a "staic block".

      • predict

        protected double predict(int u,
             int j,
             int c,
             boolean bound)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        predict a specific rating for user u on item j. It is useful for evalution which requires predictions are bounded.
        Parameters:
        u - user id
        j - item id
        c - context id
        bound - whether to bound the prediction
        Returns:
        prediction
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • correlation

        protected double correlation(librec.data.SparseVector iv,
                 librec.data.SparseVector jv,
                 java.lang.String method)
        Compute the correlation between two vectors for a specific method
        Parameters:
        iv - vector i
        jv - vector j
        method - similarity method
        Returns:
        the correlation between vectors i and j; return NaN if the correlation is not computable.
